channel.title: Client won't connect
channel.description:
Alright so, I've been running my RSPS for about 2 weeks now and the client has always connected right away. Well, I wanted to change the background so I did. I uploaded the new cache and etc.
The client downloads the new cache and loads up completely fine, but now it just gives me the same old "error connecting to server" message.
What could have happened?
Also, I changed something in ItemDef.java so when you talked to the wise old man the client wouldn't crash. But, that's not the problem because I even undid what I edited in it and it still doesn't work.
inb4"DID YOU EVEN COMPILE?"

item.title: Client won't connect
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“STOOPID, post:1, topic:458313”]Alright so, I’ve been running my RSPS for about 2 weeks now and the client has always connected right away.
Well, I wanted to change the background so I did. I uploaded the new cache and etc.

The client downloads the new cache and loads up completely fine, but now it just gives me the same old “error connecting to server” message.

What could have happened?

Also, I changed something in ItemDef.java so when you talked to the wise old man the client wouldn’t crash.
But, that’s not the problem because I even undid what I edited in it and it still doesn’t work.

inb4"DID YOU EVEN COMPILE?"[/quote]

Original poster saying “inb4”? You’re doing it wrong.

EDIT: Did you Build?

Read full topic
